title: Google\Cloud\SecretManager\V1\Topic
name: Topic
description:
A Pub/Sub topic which Secret Manager will publish to when control plane events occur on this secret.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.Topic

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the Pub/Sub topic that will be published to, in the following format: projects/*/topics/*. For publication to succeed, the Secret Manager P4SA must have pubsub.publisher permissions on the topic.

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Required. The resource name of the Pub/Sub topic that will be published to, in the following format: projects/*/topics/*. For publication to succeed, the Secret Manager P4SA must have pubsub.publisher permissions on the topic.

Generated from protobuf field string name = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
